purpose: Address AI fear in pharmacy sector through customer interview, positioning AI as tool that unlocks pharmacy potential rather than threat, demonstrating real-world benefits through user testimony.
core_message: AI unlocks pharmacy. Workflows get sharper. Services run cleaner. Clinics feel calmer. This is not a story about losing control. This is a story about getting it back.
summary: Short video customer interview addressing AI fear in pharmacy sector. Features customer testimony about AI benefits (efficiency, accuracy, service improvement) and positions AI as tool that unlocks pharmacy potential. Thought leadership content challenging sector fear and demonstrating real-world AI value.
